class.name: EditorFileDialog
class.brief_description: A modified version of [FileDialog] used by the editor.
class.description: [EditorFileDialog] is a [FileDialog] tweaked to work in editor. It automatically handles favorite and recent directory lists, synchronizes some properties with editor settings and hooks in editor callbacks for file previews. [EditorFileDialog] will automatically show native dialog based on the [member EditorSettings.interface/editor/use_native_file_dialogs] editor setting and ignores [member FileDialog.use_native_dialog].

method.name: add_side_menu
method.deprecated: This feature is no longer supported.
method.description: This method is kept for compatibility and does nothing. As an alternative, you can display another dialog after showing the file dialog.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the [EditorFileDialog] will not warn the user before overwriting files.
